column6: Wolverine...Nick Fury...Captain America...Magneto and Professor X...how are they all connected? Witness the first meeting between Charles Xavier, leader of the X-Men, and Eric Lehnsherr, the mutant who will come to be known as Magneto!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller:Gabriele Dell'Otto | other:Chris Eliopoulos | other:Dean White | inker:Butch Guice | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
